1.name: Sunnyvale Estate
1.description: A luxurious 4-bedroom estate located in the heart of Sunnyvale. Featuring a spacious garden, modern amenities, and a pool, this property offers serene living in a prime location.

2.name: Maplewood Manor
2.description: A charming 3-bedroom countryside manor surrounded by maple trees. It offers a cozy interior with a fireplace, wooden finishes, and stunning views of the nearby hills.

3.name: Oceanview Villa
3.description: This 5-bedroom beachfront villa boasts panoramic ocean views, private beach access, and a large deck for outdoor entertaining. Perfect for those seeking a coastal retreat.

4.name: Greenfield Apartment
4.description: A stylish 2-bedroom apartment in the bustling Greenfield district. The apartment offers modern interiors and is close to parks, cafes, and shopping areas.

5.name: Riverside Cottage
5.description: A picturesque cottage by the river, featuring a rustic design and a peaceful environment, ideal for relaxation and a quick getaway.

6.name: Urban Loft
6.description: A modern loft in the heart of the city with open spaces, high ceilings, and a rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views.

7.name: Mountain Retreat
7.description: A secluded cabin located in the mountains, offering breathtaking views, hiking trails nearby, and a cozy fireplace.
